DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate impact praziquantel treatment Schistosoma haematobium infection among schoolchildren Al Salamania Central Sudan .
DOC.detailed_description: A longitudinal study conduct evaluate impact praziquantel treatment Schistosoma haematobium infection among schoolchildren Al Salamania Central Sudan . A cohort schoolchildren ( 6-15 year age ) investigate 1 year treatment single dose praziquantel 40mg/kg .
